mapper.insert: insert into db_bullet (SEQUENCEID, SPCODE, TARGET, SMSDATE, BULLETTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, MYID, BTITLE, CONTENT, BOPER, BGROUP, BCLASS) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{smsdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bullettype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{btitle,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{boper,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{bgroup,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{bclass,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_bullet set SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SMSDATE = #{smsdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BULLETTYPE = #{bullettype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MYID = #{myid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BTITLE = #{btitle,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, BOPER = #{boper,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, BGROUP = #{bgroup,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, BCLASS = #{bclass,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SPCODE, TARGET, SMSDATE, BULLETTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, MYID, BTITLE, CONTENT, BOPER, BGROUP, BCLASS from db_bullet where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, SPCODE, TARGET, SMSDATE, BULLETTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, MYID, BTITLE, CONTENT, BOPER, BGROUP, BCLASS from db_bullet
